org.jppf.serialization

Class DefaultJavaSerialization

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jppf.serialization.DefaultJavaSerialization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JPPFSerialization

    public class DefaultJavaSerialization
extends Object
implements JPPFSerialization
    This implementation uses the default Java serialization.
